Verses: 1 karththaave, Umadhu Dhesaththinmel Piriyam Vaiththu, Yaakkobin Siraiyiruppaith Thiruppineer.
2 umadhu Janaththin Akkiramaththai Manniththu, Avargal Paavaththaiyellaam Moodineer. (selaa.)
3 umadhu Ukkiraththaiyellaam Adakkikkondu, Umadhu Kobaththin Erichchalaivittuth Thirumbineer.
4 engal Ratchippin Dhevane, Neer Engalaith Thiruppikkonduvaarum, Engalmelulla Umadhu Kobaththai Aarappannum.
5 endraikkum Engalmel Kobamaayiruppeero? Thalaimurai Thalaimuraiyaaga Umadhu Kobaththai Neediththirukkappannuveero?
6 umadhu Janangal Ummil Magizhndhirukkumpadi Neer Engalaith Thirumba Uyirppikkamaatteero?
7 karththaave, Umadhu Kirubaiyai Engalukkuk Kaanbiththu, Umadhu Ratchippai Engalukku Arulichseyyum.
8 karththaraagiya Dhevan Vilambuvadhaik Ketpen; Avar Thammudaiya Janangalukkum Thammudaiya Parisuththavaangalukkum Samaadhaanam Kooruvaar; Avargalo Madhikettukkuth Thirumbaadhiruppaargalaaga.
9 nammudaiya Dhesaththil Magimai Vaasamaayirukkumpadi, Avarudaiya Ratchippu Avarukkup Bayandhavargalukkuch Sameebamaayirukkiradhu.
10 kirubaiyum Saththiyamum Ondraiyondru Sandhikkum, Needhiyum Samaadhaanamum Ondraiyondru Muththanseyyum.
11 saththiyam Boomiyilirundhu Mulaikkum, Needhi Vaanaththilirundhu Thaazhappaarkkum.
12 karththar Nanmaiyaanadhaith Tharuvaar; Nammudaiya Dhesamum Than Balanaik Kodukkum.
13 needhi Avarukku Munnaagach Sendru, Avarudaiya Adichchuvadugalin Vazhiyile Nammai Niruththum.
